ISSUE.TITLE: listen on port 80 and redirect to https
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: optionally drone should be able to listen on port 80 and redirect to https://... maybe that can be better achieved with a reverse-proxy setup with nginx in production for example? example nginx vhost: ``` server { listen 80; server_name drone.example.com; return 301 https://$server_name$request_uri; } ```
